TopicTitle: Halco Industries | Harrier Jump Jet Replica

Articles.Content:
New Replica: Harrier Jump Jet (yes thats what its called)

Hovers at full throttle (so its a good starter VTOL to learn how to fly a VTOL) can land almost anywhere (Including water!!!), like any VTOL, if you're good enough at flying, can go under all three bridges! Wings need a little work but as always I did my best!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: http://www./download/2x78ygfg5bg9k78/Harrier+VTOL+replica_.craft

Credit to Zekes for adding VTOL capabilities (I'm not good at making VTOL's).

Colors are from KerbPaint and suits are from UniverseReplacer, so in other words, its compatible with 100% stock KSP.
Cool it works in FAR, maybe you can do a version with less reaction wheels tho

Cool it works in FAR, maybe you can do a version with less reaction wheels tho

I did the SAS units mainly for weight distribution and symmetry, but you can remove them, it wont make a difference during flight. (only if you remove all of them or none of them)
hum yes but you loose almost all the stability and angle of attack

hum yes but you loose almost all the stability and angle of attack

True true.

Anyone have any requests?

True true.

Anyone have any requests?

The [h=2]F/A-22 Raptor[/h]would be a good one.

would be a good one.

I'll work on that in.... 4 days starting tomorrow! (Have family coming and staying at my house, sorry!)
